queryMap.query: SELECT TCI .RACER_PERIO_NO -- 기수 , TCI .CAND_NO -- 후보생번호 , TCI .NM_KOR -- 후보생명 , TCRR.AVG_RACE_TIME -- 평균시간 , TCR .CNT -- F수 , TCR .F_CNT -- F수 , TCR .L_CNT -- L수 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_1_1 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_1_2 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_1_3 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_1_4 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_1_5 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_1_6 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_1_7 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_1_1 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_1_2 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_1_3 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_1_4 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_1_5 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_1_6 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_1_7 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_2_1 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_2_2 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_2_3 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_2_4 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_2_5 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_2_6 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_2_7 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_2_1 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_2_2 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_2_3 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_2_4 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_2_5 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_2_6 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_2_7 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_3_1 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_3_2 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_3_3 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_3_4 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_3_5 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_3_6 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_3_7 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_3_1 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_3_2 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_3_3 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_3_4 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_3_5 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_3_6 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_3_7 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_4_1 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_4_2 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_4_3 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_4_4 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_4_5 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_4_6 , TCRD.RACE_COURSE_4_7 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_4_1 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_4_2 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_4_3 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_4_4 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_4_5 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_4_6 , TCRD.RACE_TIME_4_7 FROM ( SELECT TCRO.CAND_NO -- 훈련생번호 , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(DECODE(TCRO.VIOL, '110', 1)) F_CNT , SUM(DECODE(TCRO.VIOL, '120', 1)) L_CNT FROM TBDN_CAND_RACE_ORGAN TCRO , TBDN_CAND_RACE_RACE TCR WHERE TCR .RACER_PERIO_NO = TCRO.RACER_PERIO_NO -- 기수 AND TCR .DAY_NO = TCRO.DAY_NO -- 출주번호 AND TCR .ROUND = TCRO.ROUND -- 라운드 AND TCR .RACER_PERIO_NO = ? -- 기수 AND TCR .GBN = ? -- 구분 GROUP BY TCRO.CAND_NO -- 훈련생번호 ) TCR , ( SELECT TCRO.CAND_NO -- 훈련생번호 , ROUND(AVG(TCRR.RACE_TIME), 2) AVG_RACE_TIME FROM TBDN_CAND_RACE_ORGAN TCRO , TBDN_CAND_RACE_RECD TCRR , TBDN_CAND_RACE_RACE TCR WHERE TCR .RACER_PERIO_NO = TCRO.RACER_PERIO_NO -- 기수 AND TCR .DAY_NO = TCRO.DAY_NO -- 출주번호 AND TCR .ROUND = TCRO.ROUND -- 라운드 AND TCRO.RACER_PERIO_NO = TCRR.RACER_PERIO_NO -- 기수 AND TCRO.DAY_NO = TCRR.DAY_NO -- 출주번호 AND TCRO.ROUND = TCRR.ROUND -- 라운드 AND TCRO.TEAM_NO = TCRR.TEAM_NO -- 조번호 AND TCRO.RACE_REG_NO = TCRR.RACE_REG_NO -- 정번번호 AND TCRO.RACER_PERIO_NO = ? -- 기수 AND TCR .GBN = ? -- 구분 GROUP BY TCRO.CAND_NO -- 훈련생번호 ) TCRR , ( SELECT TCRO.CAND_NO , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '11', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_1_1 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '12', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_1_2 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '13', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_1_3 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '14', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_1_4 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '15', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_1_5 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '16', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_1_6 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '17', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_1_7 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '11', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_1_1 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '12', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_1_2 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '13', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_1_3 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '14', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_1_4 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '15', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_1_5 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '16', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_1_6 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '17', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_1_7 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '21', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_2_1 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '22', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_2_2 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '23', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_2_3 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '24', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_2_4 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '25', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_2_5 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '26', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_2_6 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '27', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_2_7 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '21', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_2_1 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '22', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_2_2 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '23', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_2_3 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '24', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_2_4 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '25', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_2_5 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '26', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_2_6 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '27', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_2_7 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '31', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_3_1 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '32', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_3_2 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '33', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_3_3 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '34', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_3_4 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '35', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_3_5 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '36', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_3_6 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '37', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_3_7 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '31', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_3_1 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '32', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_3_2 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '33', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_3_3 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '34', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_3_4 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '35', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_3_5 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '36', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_3_6 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '37', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_3_7 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '41', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_4_1 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '42', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_4_2 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '43', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_4_3 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '44', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_4_4 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '45', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_4_5 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '46', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_4_6 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '47', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_4_7 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '41', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_4_1 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '42', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_4_2 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '43', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_4_3 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '44', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_4_4 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '45', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_4_5 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '46', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_4_6 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '47', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_4_7 FROM TBDN_CAND_RACE_ORGAN TCRO , TBDN_CAND_RACE_RECD TCRR , TBDN_CAND_RACE_RACE TCR WHERE TCR .RACER_PERIO_NO = TCRO.RACER_PERIO_NO -- 기수 AND TCR .DAY_NO = TCRO.DAY_NO -- 출주번호 AND TCR .ROUND = TCRO.ROUND -- 라운드 AND TCRO.RACER_PERIO_NO = TCRR.RACER_PERIO_NO -- 기수 AND TCRO.DAY_NO = TCRR.DAY_NO -- 출주번호 AND TCRO.ROUND = TCRR.ROUND -- 라운드 AND TCRO.TEAM_NO = TCRR.TEAM_NO -- 조번호 AND TCRO.RACE_REG_NO = TCRR.RACE_REG_NO -- 정번번호 AND TCR .GBN = ? -- 구분 AND TCRO.RACER_PERIO_NO = ? -- 기수 AND TCRO.DAY_NO = ? -- 출주번호 AND TCRO.ROUND = ? -- 라운드 GROUP BY TCRO.CAND_NO -- 훈련생번호 ) TCRD , TBDN_CAND_IDENT TCI WHERE TCI .CAND_NO = TCR .CAND_NO(+) AND TCI .CAND_NO = TCRR.CAND_NO(+) AND TCI .CAND_NO = TCRD.CAND_NO(+) AND TCI .RACER_PERIO_NO = ? -- 기수 ORDER BY TCI .CAND_NO

SELECT 0 AS CNT,0 AS AVG,0 AS F,0 AS L , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_1_1 ), 2) RACE_TIME_1_1 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_1_2 ), 2) RACE_TIME_1_2 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_1_3 ), 2) RACE_TIME_1_3 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_1_4 ), 2) RACE_TIME_1_4 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_1_5 ), 2) RACE_TIME_1_5 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_1_6 ), 2) RACE_TIME_1_6 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_1_7 ), 2) RACE_TIME_1_7 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_2_1 ), 2) RACE_TIME_2_1 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_2_2 ), 2) RACE_TIME_2_2 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_2_3 ), 2) RACE_TIME_2_3 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_2_4 ), 2) RACE_TIME_2_4 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_2_5 ), 2) RACE_TIME_2_5 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_2_6 ), 2) RACE_TIME_2_6 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_2_7 ), 2) RACE_TIME_2_7 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_3_1 ), 2) RACE_TIME_3_1 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_3_2 ), 2) RACE_TIME_3_2 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_3_3 ), 2) RACE_TIME_3_3 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_3_4 ), 2) RACE_TIME_3_4 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_3_5 ), 2) RACE_TIME_3_5 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_3_6 ), 2) RACE_TIME_3_6 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_3_7 ), 2) RACE_TIME_3_7 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_4_1 ), 2) RACE_TIME_4_1 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_4_2 ), 2) RACE_TIME_4_2 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_4_3 ), 2) RACE_TIME_4_3 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_4_4 ), 2) RACE_TIME_4_4 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_4_5 ), 2) RACE_TIME_4_5 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_4_6 ), 2) RACE_TIME_4_6 , ROUND(AVG(TCRD.RACE_TIME_4_7 ), 2) RACE_TIME_4_7 FROM ( SELECT TCRO.CAND_NO , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '11', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_1_1 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '12', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_1_2 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '13', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_1_3 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '14', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_1_4 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '15', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_1_5 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '16', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_1_6 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '17', TCRR.RACE_COURSE)) RACE_COURSE_1_7 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '11', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_1_1 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '12', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_1_2 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '13', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_1_3 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '14', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_1_4 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '15', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_1_5 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '46', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_4_6 , MIN(DECODE(TCRR.TEAM_NO||TCRR.RACE_SEQ, '47', TCRR.RACE_TIME )) RACE_TIME_4_7 FROM TBDN_CAND_RACE_ORGAN TCRO , TBDN_CAND_RACE_RECD TCRR , TBDN_CAND_RACE_RACE TCR WHERE TCR .RACER_PERIO_NO = TCRO.RACER_PERIO_NO -- 기수 AND TCR .DAY_NO = TCRO.DAY_NO -- 출주번호 AND TCR .ROUND = TCRO.ROUND -- 라운드 AND TCRO.RACER_PERIO_NO = TCRR.RACER_PERIO_NO -- 기수 AND TCRO.DAY_NO = TCRR.DAY_NO -- 출주번호 AND TCRO.ROUND = TCRR.ROUND -- 라운드 AND TCRO.TEAM_NO = TCRR.TEAM_NO -- 조번호 AND TCRO.RACE_REG_NO = TCRR.RACE_REG_NO -- 정번번호 AND TCR .GBN = ? -- 구분 AND TCRO.RACER_PERIO_NO = ? -- 기수 AND TCRO.DAY_NO = ? -- 출주번호 AND TCRO.ROUND = ? -- 라운드 GROUP BY TCRO.CAND_NO -- 훈련생번호 ) TCRD
